price: Sizi yeryüzünde yaratıp yayan da O'dur. Ve yine O'nun huzurunda toplanacaksınız.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
